    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(String name)
      Part lookup. Allows us to lookup parts based on name or ID.
      Parameters:
      name - is a String that allows us to search
      Returns:
      Returns an observable list of parts that has been filtered given the search result

      Returns:
      Returns an obserable list of products that has been filtered given the search result

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part part)
      Updates Part. Allows us to update parts within modify tables using a index of that part and a part object.
      Parameters:
      index - an Integer of where the selected part is indexed using FXML
      part - a Part object of what is being updated

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product product)
      Updates Product. Allows us to update products within modify tables using an index of that product and a project object.
      Parameters:
      index - An integer of where the selected product is indexed using FXML
      product - a Product object of what is being updated

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part part)
      Deletes part. A boolen that takes a part and removes it from the allParts list.
      Parameters:
      part - Part object of part to be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns a bool depending on if part was found and deleted within the allParts list

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product product)
      Deletes product. A boolean that takes a product and remoes it form teh allProducts list.
      Parameters:
      product - Products object of product to be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns a bool depending on if product was found and deleted within the allProducts list
